pkgmetadata.longdescription: Microsoft Azure CLI 'policyinsights' Command Module===================================================This package is for the 'policyinsights' module.i.e. 'az policy event' and 'az policy state'.. :changelog:Release History===============0.1.4++++++* Minor fixes0.1.3++++++++++++++++++* Add support for `--expand PolicyEvaluationDetails` to query policy evaluation details on the resource.0.1.2++++++++++++++++++* Minor fixes0.1.1++++++++++++++++++* Add `policy remediation` commands to support resource policy remediation features.0.1.0++++++++++++++++++* Initial Release
